This Privacy Policy (the " Privacy Policy ") describes the types of information Traction Rec Technologies Inc. (" Traction Rec " or " we ") collects from you, or from subscribers (" you " or " your ") via Traction Rec's website and contents (the " Website ").
We obtain information from Cookies when you visit the Website.
By accessing or using the Website, you agree that we may collect, use, and disclose Personal Data, Aggregate Information, and Cookies pursuant to this Privacy Policy.
